name: I Like Dreamin'
content: Cause dreamin' can make you mine
Close my eyes and feelin' fine
I see us on the shore
St Thmoas Beach a million times
Two lovers kissin' in the sand
Cause dreamin' can make you mine
Close my eyes and feelin' fine
The world we share until I wake
Cause dreamin' can make you mine
Even if it's in my mind
Cause dreamin' can make you mine
Close my eyes and feelin' fine
Cause dreamin' can make you mine
Close my eyes and feelin' fine
Cause dreamin' can make you mine
Close my eyes and feelin' fine
Cause dreamin' can make you mine
